description:
Checks whether the specified data is missing data, i.e. equals to `null` or any of the no-data values specified in the metadata.

The special numerical value `NaN` (not a number) as defined by the [IEEE Standard 754](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/4610935) is only considered as no-data value if specified as no-data value in the metdata.

returns.description: `true` if the data is a no-data value, otherwise `false`.
